name: @apps/linear-mcp
description: MCP server for basic Linear operations

scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && shx chmod +x dist/*.js
scripts.dev: chokidar 'dist/main.js' -c 'chmod +x dist/main.js' & tsc --noCheck --watch & yarn inspector & shx chmod +x dist/*.js
scripts.postinstall: [ "${CI:-false}" != "true" ] && yarn build || echo 'Skipping Linear MCP build in CI'
